This game is a very challenging First-person-puzzler, and it has amasing graphics. The storyline is very complex and perfect for anyone wanting to do a walkthrough. I know i would, but I don't have a Youtube account. It is great with mixing sci-fi and thinking into the world of VALVe. This game is five stars in my book!

Glados是我玩过游戏中最可爱的机器人

平台解谜类游戏，其独创的传送门玩法，使得该系列成为游戏史上的一代经典。

另有双人合作模式，以及创意工坊的支持，挑战不同难度的关卡，和基友一起动脑筋吧。

如果没有玩过，就赶紧买吧。

"That would be funny
  If it weren't so sad"

[h1] Цитаты Гладоса [/h1]
[quote=Гладос] Он не обычный дурак. Он — продукт величайших умов целого поколения, старавшихся создать наиглупейшего дурака в мире. А ты поставила его управлять этим комплексом [/quote]
[quote=Гладос] Помнишь, я тебе говорила про мусор, который стоит? Стоит и смердит? Так вот — это была метафора. Я имела в виду тебя	[/quote]
[quote=Гладос] Эта панель не расчитана на испытуемых твоего веса. Я добавлю несколько нулей к ее максимальному грузу. Кстати, отлично выглядишь. Очень здоровой.	[/quote]

Ich hatte auf YouTube eine andere Person dieses Spiel spielen sehen und habe es mir dann auch sofort gekauft. Mit Steam hatte ich keine großen Probleme, runterladen, anmelden, fertig.
Die Story ist sehr gut gestaltet, die Testräume manchmal echt knifflig, aber mit der Zeit lernt man immer besser, in Portalen zu denken :)
Der Co-op-Mode ist wunderbar, ein kleiner Ersatz dafür, dass das Spiel doch etwas kurz ist, man sollte seine Freunde schnell überreden, sich auch Portal 2 anzuschaffen, damit man einen Mitspieler hat. Sonst findet sich bestimmt auch jemand auf Steam, der mitspielen möchte!
this game is fun even after you beat the game you can ethire play the coop or you can create and download test chambers

This is an amazing game, and VERY well-made.  The custom chamber building thing is fun.  I really like the plot and characters, and the comic is a good touch.
This is the first puzzle game I actually enjoyed. 10/10 (literally)
Portal 2 is Portal but a little bit better and little bit longer.

Portal 2 is by far one of the best games I have ever played. It has the perfect balance of complex puzzle solving mixed with the artistic fun of the multiple ways you can go about solving the puzzles. Not to mention the hilarious story that is told along the way. I couldn’t help to find myself laughing as I played, which is a rarity with me. I would recommend this game to anyone, whether they be a gamer or not. 

Noted I have yet to play Portal 2 co-op, however I will be doing so very soon.

This is BY FAR my favorite Valve game.

Pros:
+Pretty Good Graphics
+Great Soundtrack
+Great Characters
+Funny Dialouge
+Unique and Fun Puzzles
+Great Story
+Custom Chambers/Workshop Support
+Multiplayer (With It's Own Campaign!)
+Introduces Enough Gameplay Elements to Separate It From Portal 1
+Much, MUCH More

Cons:
-You're Still Sitting In Your Chair Reading This Review and Not Getting This Game

I HIGHLY recommend this game... EVEN if you don't like puzzles!
zzaebis'

How have I not done a review on this game yet? After 21.2 hours, I would say it deserves one. This game is like every good puzzle games... but with Portals. This is the amazing squel to Portal. Although the Portal series is very short on gameplay time, I mean, you can finish both games twice in about 7 hours. This is perhaps the 2ND MOST PERFECT GAME IN EXISTENCE... right behind Tetris. Don't judge. I love Tetris. Tetris is love... Tetris is life. Anyway, basically you use a Portal Gun to make Portals and get through the chambers. That's basically the game in a few words. Also, robots. This game also inspired my motto: "Don't Eat the Cubes." Buy this game now! It's worth $19.99. In fact, it's worth $30. Or mybe not. Mybe only $25. Whatever. Buy it!

One of my all time favorite games. Play it, fall in love, and play it again.

A great sequel that delivers more of all the things that made the first Portal a great game. Story, puzzles, and environments. A great soundtrack.

Adds co-op play, which is also a delight, and an in-game puzzle creation tool that's easy to use. Playing and rating custom maps is great fun.

10/10

I love this game, its unlike any other puzzle game ive played and probably my favorite puzzle game. The mix between the humor of the characters and the fps elements are amazing. But what I loved most about this game is the pacing of the puzzles. The pace was never too fast or too slow and the simple controles are amazing. The physics in this game are great as well, you will be teleporting, jumping, and just doing some amazing things. The only downside is the story, its great in my opinion but, I would like to have seen the story go deeper.       10/10 buy it now

Portal 2 is a rarity; a game that will challenge you, a game that will make you think. With a surprisingly deep storyline, fantastic voice work and solid, well-thought out and plentiful puzzles and enviorments, I can't recommend Portal 2 highly enough.

It's also worth mentioning the highly intuitive test chamber editor. Although it may not be as complex and as powerful as Hammer, it certainly delivers for budding newcomers learning to map in Source. Likewise, there are also rich mini-series created by ordinary players just like you and I. May I recommend 12 Angry Tests and Designed For Danger as some of the finest examples?

Overall, a fantastic achievement not just for Valve, but for the Source modding community in general.

对于这个游戏，我的评价就一个字：棒！
如果你想了解详细内容，请往下看：

============================================

这是一款需要动脑子的游戏，操作很简单，解谜则是难点。
如果你对自己的智商不自信，也没有关系，大部分的谜题还是很平易近人的。
如果你对自己的智商很自信，也请来挑战吧，总会遇到让你也抓狂的谜题。

============================================

如果你有一个可爱的女朋友，这个游戏很适合和情侣一起玩。
如果你没有女朋友，这个游戏很适合和朋友一起玩。
如果你也没有朋友，这个游戏也很适合一个人玩。
如果你还没有这个游戏，买买买买买！
如果你没有钱，你可以去工作赚钱。
如果你找不到工作，那你还可以去抢银行。
如果你抢银行被抓了。。。至少你尽力了，到时候我送你一个好了。。

============================================

有人说这个游戏的关卡玩第二遍就没意思了。他说的很对。然后让我来给你们算一笔账：

1.首先第一次玩的话，官方单人战役够你玩个10小时左右；通关了之后还可以继续双人合作战役，5个小时左右。

2.然后你通关了。游戏玩完了嘛？错了，游戏才刚刚开始。

3.在游戏的创意工坊里，有合作实验室61426个，单人实验室387466个。也就是说目前总共有61426+387466=448892个实验室。

4.平均每个实验室花费15分钟肯定是有的，每天玩传送门2个半小时就是150分钟，那每天就能玩150/15=10个实验室。

5.那玩完目前全部的实验室需要44889.2天也就是44889/365=122.9835616年≈123年。这还没考虑每天都有很多新的实验室诞生。

6.你觉得你能活123年嘛？

所以《传送门2》的关卡你这辈子都玩不完了。需要玩第二遍么。。。

============================================

精彩的谜题，无尽的关卡。这游戏打折的时候才5刀。这么良心的游戏，不买还是人么？？？

++++++++++++++++++
 ↓↓↓以下是英文版本↓↓↓
 ↓↓↓English Version↓↓↓
++++++++++++++++++

For this game, my review contains only one word: AWESOME!
Continue reading if you want more details:

============================================

This is a game that you need to bring your brain with you. It is easy in control, but hard in solving puzzles.
If you are not confident with your IQ, it's okay cause most of those puzzles are not that hard.
If you are confident with your IQ, please come all the same, there must be one puzzle that will drive you crazy.

============================================

If you've got a lovely girlfriend, this is a great game to play with your girlfriend;
If you don't have a girlfriend, this is a great game to play with your firends;
If you don't have any friends, this is a great game to play alone;
If you don't have the game to play, get money for it;
If you don't have money for it, get a job;
If you don't have a job, rob a bank;
If you got arrested for robbing a bank, at least you tried...I'll send you one as a gift.

============================================

Some people say that this game would be boring if you play the same laboratory twice. Yeah he's right. Then I'll do the math for you:

1. Firstly, if this is your first time in the game, official campaign will cost you about 10 hrs, then the coop campaign, another 5 hrs;

2. Then you will have got though all of them. End of the game? No, just the beginning.

3. In the workshop, there are 61,427 coop labs and 387,466 single player labs. 448,892 labs in total.

4. Every lab will cost you 15 min in average, if you play Portal2 2.5 hours every day, then you will experience 10 labs each day.

5. Then, it will take you 44889.2 days, in the other word, 123 years, to solve all those puzzles. And new made labs are not in the consideration

6. Do you think you can live for 123 years?

So you cannot have played all of those Portal2 laboratories in your single life. Is there any necessity to play the same lab twice?

============================================

Well designed puzzles, Countless laboratories, Only $5 in promotion days, Won't you buy it if you still have humanity???

I have to say when I first saw a Portal 2 demo a year ago on the Xbox 360, I thought it was just another game that you play it once and thats it. After buying Portal 2 I realized how fun it was. Although my data didn't save after completing the game I really don't care as I would have replayed the game whether or not my game saves were gone. If you were to ask me if I would recommend this game I would say definitely. 10 out of 10 would think with portals again.

Valve’ın aslında pek çok oyuncuda büyük bir hayal kırıklığına uğrattığına hepimiz hem fikirizdir büyük olasılıkla. Nitekim Valve’ın Valve olmasını sağlayan, oyun dünyasına 40 milyon tonluk ağır bir top gibi düşen Half-Life’ın Episode 3’ünü yıllar geçmesine rağmen çıkartmaması pek çok kişiyi hayal kırklığına uğrattı. Ancak Valve bu işte bir yerden alırken bir yerden veriyor.
